SEARCH
Package JEST.controller

Class PlayerRouter

java.lang.Object
JEST.controller.PlayerRouter
public class PlayerRouter extends Object
Lightweight router that delegates player-specific operations to the appropriate controller based on the player's preferred interface (GUI or Console).

This class only handles the 3 operations that depend on individual player preferences: - askMakeOffer - askChooseOffer - displayCardAddedToJest

All other game operations (setup, save, global displays) should use the main GameController directly.

  • Method Details

    • askMakeOffer

      public int askMakeOffer(Player player, String jest, Card c1, Card c2)
      Ask a player to make an offer, using their preferred interface.
      Parameters:
      player - the player making the offer
      jest - the player's current jest
      c1 - first card
      c2 - second card
      Returns:
      the index of the card to show face up (1 or 2)

    • askChooseOffer

      public int[] askChooseOffer(Player player, String jest, List<Player> availablePlayers)
      Ask a player to choose an offer, using their preferred interface.
      Parameters:
      player - the player choosing
      jest - the player's current jest
      availablePlayers - players with available offers
      Returns:
      array with [playerIndex, cardChoice]

      Parameters:

      card - the card that was added
